titles.title: Congratulating the on-premise sign industry for its contributions to the success of small businesses on the occasion of its 63rd Annual International Sign Expo.
Congratulating the on-premise sign industry for its contributions to the success of small businesses on the occasion of its 63rd Annual International Sign Expo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Applauds the Small Business Administration for educating small business owners on the benefits of using on-premise signs to overcome competitive disadvantages in marketing and advertising.
Congratulates the members of the on-premises sign and sign products industry on their 63rd Annual International Sign Expo and encourages the on-premises sign industry to continue events such as the Expo to educate the small business community about the benefits of effective signage.
